actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research

official_title: To properly balance the wind and water erosion criteria and the wildlife suitability criteria to be used in the 16th signup of land in the conservation reserve program.

summary.text: Provides that with respect to a specified conservation reserve program signup (under the Food Security Act of 1985), certain highly erodible land meeting related wind and water erosion criteria shall: (1) be deemed to meet wildlife criteria; and (2) receive maximum points for wildlife benefits.

titles.title: To properly balance the wind and water erosion criteria and the wildlife suitability criteria to be used in the 16th signup of land in the conservation reserve program.
